title: Can't connect to game
body: I haven't had a problem with LoL like this before. I was even playing earlier today just fine, but then I took a break to do some homework and laundry and when I came back and started a game it tells me "Unable to connect." I can not even load into game at all now and I am getting in trouble with team mate because I can't play the damn game, but they do not know that an they report me and I get punished for this even though there is nothing I can do about it. I already played around with my connection as much as I could (since I am at college there are some things I can not do), tried restarting my computer, and even trying downloading the "Hextech Repair Tool that I found on a post by RiotBrokenSword that is supposed to be a temporary fix and none of that worked at all. Please tell me something I can do, I do not like playing this game for over 6 years and then being severely punished because the game itself doesn't work properly. Please fix this or tell me there is something I can do.

replies.body:
It seems like there might be a game file specific to Summoner's Rift that might have become corrupted somehow =\ . When you used the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), be sure that you had the force repatch/reinstall options picked and then let it run. 

If you already ran it with those options selected, it might be better for us to look at your issue one on one in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I started testing things out because the client itself works, I can type to friends, I can make lobbies, I can queue for game and even works fine in match lobby for picking champs, runes and masteries. I started making some custom games to test things out and it seems like it is only on the ARAM and TT map does the game tell me I can not connect, but SR work fine atleast in custom games against bots anyway.
